Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ke kaloku iXilongo liya kuvuthelwa, baze ngoko nangoko baphume emangcwabeni beze eNkosini yabo bengxamile
Baya kuthi: “O yini na kuthi! Ngubani na osivusileyo endaweni yethu yokulala?” (Impendulo iya kuthi): “Oku	koko	uSozinceba	Wakuthembisayo,	yaye abaThunywa babethetha inyaniso.”
Akuyi kuba yinto yimbi ngaphandle kwesithonga esinye baze ngoko nangoko babuyiswe phambi kweThu
Ngoko ke (kuya kuthiwa kubo): “(NaMhlanje) akuyi kubakho mphefumlo uya kwenziwa bugwenxa konke konke, kananjalo aniyi kubuyekezwa ngaphandle koko nakwenzayo.”
Inene amadlelane asePaladesi ngaloo Mini aya kuhleka echulumancile, esebenza imisebenzi (yawo) emihle
Bona nabalingane babo besemthunzini, bengqiyame ngeesofa ezihonjisiweyo
Okwabo apho iya kuba ziziqhamo, yaye okwabo iya kuba yiyo nantoni na abayicelayo (okanye abayinqwenelayo)
(Uya kuthi Yena): “Yimani ngokwahlukeneyo nina zaphula- mthetho
NdaNdinganiyalelanga na ukuba ningamkhonzi uShaytân, hini na bantwana baka-Adam kuba yena kuni ulutshaba olucacileyo
Kwanokuba nina nqulani Mna kuphela Le yiNdlela ethe Tye
Kananjalo yena phakathi kwenu sele elahlekise inyambalala endalweni, ke ngoko nina naningayisebenzisi ingqiqo
Yitshani naMhlanje ngenxa yoko nanidla ngokukuphika!”
Ngaloo Mini Siya kuyitywina imilomo yabo, kuze kuthethe izandla zabo kuThi, iinyawo zabo zona ziya kungqina ngoko bakwenzayo
Ke kaloku ukuba SaSithandile ngeSaSibatshabalalisele amehlo abo, baza bakhuphisana (ngokufuna) indlela, phofu babeza kuyibona kanjani
Kananjalo ukuba SaSithandile ngeSabenza baba ziimbedlenge ezindaweni zabo khona ukuze bangakwazi (ukuhamba) baye phambili, bangakwazi nokubuyela umva
